content:
Certainly! Here's a possible rewording of your statement to provide constructive feedback to your teammate:

"I appreciate your willingness to help me with the video, but I did not find the information regarding the OCBC/RBC expenses that you mentioned. In the future, it would be helpful if we could double-check and confirm details before sharing them with each other to ensure that we both have the most accurate information. This will help us build trust and strengthen our communication as a team. Thank you for your support."
